game.s_dis: Subway Surfers: Houston brings players to a water-themed city track, playable online unblocked with new characters, hoverboards, and city-inspired collectibles.
game.l_dis:
Subway Surfers: Houston – Dash Through the Water-Themed Tracks of Texas

Subway Surfers: Houston immerses players in Houston’s unique tracks and city-themed environments. Run, jump, and slide along water tracks, dodging trains, barriers, and collecting coins, city items, and power-ups.

What is Subway Surfers: Houston?

This limited-time edition features Houston-themed environments, a new character Buzz, a shuttle-themed Hoverboard, and collectibles inspired by the city for Weekly Hunt rewards.

How to Play Subway Surfers: Houston?

  • Swipe Controls: Swipe up to jump, down to roll, left/right to switch lanes.
  • Collect Coins & City Items: Gather coins, Houston-themed collectibles, and other items to unlock Weekly Hunt rewards like hoverboards and keys.
  • Dodge Obstacles: Avoid trains, water hazards, and city-themed obstacles while maintaining your run.
  • Use Power-Ups: Activate magnets, jetpacks, and hoverboards to extend your run and maximize your score.

Why Play Subway Surfers: Houston Unblocked?

Experience Houston’s water-themed city tracks in Subway Surfers: Houston online without restrictions, unlock new characters, boards, and city-inspired collectibles.

Key Features

  • Houston Environment: Explore water tracks, city landmarks, and themed visuals inspired by Houston.
  • Exclusive Characters & Boards: Unlock Buzz and the shuttle-themed Hoverboard.
  • Endless Runner Gameplay: Classic swipe-based controls with a Houston twist.
  • Special Collectibles: Collect city-inspired items for Weekly Hunt rewards.
  • Unblocked Online: Play instantly in your browser anywhere.

Master Houston's Subway Tracks!

Run, jump, and slide through Subway Surfers: Houston to beat obstacles, collect rewards, and enjoy the water-themed city environment!
